ygData.subject: Re: EverQuest -- It is an RPG!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, I m hoping that I lucked into one of the only truly cool trade skills, which can make things that can not be found anywhere else, (i.e. goggles
ygData.messageBody:
>
>
> Hmm, I'm still trying to figure out exactly where the fun is in spending
> lots of time creating (seemingly) worthless objects. I don't know about
> other people, but I want to feel like my time is well spent, like I'm
> accomplishing something. Creating an object that's worth less than its
> components, not even considering the time spent, is not much of an
> accomplishment.

Actually, I'm hoping that I lucked into one of the only truly cool trade
skills, which can make things that can not be found anywhere else, (i.e.
goggles that let humans see perfectly at night, shirts that raise cold
resistences, collapsable fishing poles, you know important stuff). The
skill? Tinkering, which I've seen no one do yet, so I'll post when all the
humans can come buy my goggles. Or when you can get some fireworks from me.

-Zikkin, think being a Gome is cool, and besides Gnome's are sexxy.
